publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3707 Ms Sandra White: Release of Pastor Daly and Family from Yarl’s Wood Detention Centre—That the Parliament notes the decision by the immigration adjudicator to order the release of Pastor Daly and his family from Yarl’s Wood Detention Centre and for them to be allowed to return home to Glasgow until at least March 2006; notes that Sandra White MSP, Rosie Kane MSP and Margaret Woods from Glasgow Campaign to Welcome Refugees have now lodged bail money for the family and that the family should be back in Glasgow on Friday 9 December 2005, and congratulates all the people who have supported the campaign to free this family from unwarranted detention and deportation.

S2M-3707 Ms Sandra White: Release of Pastor Daly and Family from Yarl’s Wood Detention Centre—That the Parliament notes the decision by the immigration adjudicator to order the release of Pastor Daly and his family from Yarl’s Wood Detention Centre and for them to be allowed to return home to Glasgow until at least March 2006; notes that Sandra White MSP, Rosie Kane MSP and Margaret Woods from Glasgow Campaign to Welcome Refugees have now lodged bail money for the family and that the family should be back in Glasgow on Friday 9 December 2005, and congratulates all the people who have supported the campaign to free this family from unwarranted detention and deportation.
S2M-3707 Release of Pastor Daly and Family from Yarl’s Wood Detention Centre (lodged on 8 December 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3707 Release of Pastor Daly and Family from Yarl’s Wood Detention Centre (lodged on 8 December 2005) John Swinburne*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3707 Release of Pastor Daly and Family from Yarl’s Wood Detention Centre (lodged on 8 December 2005) Michael Matheson*
S2M-3707 Release of Pastor Daly and Family from Yarl’s Wood Detention Centre (lodged on 8 December 2005) Elaine Smith*
